Hi, I'm Eric!

Tech enthusiast passionate about Cyber Security and Information Technology.

Here you'll find my tech journey, and the lessons learned along the way!

My journey began at a small Managed Service Provider, where I fell in love with learning about computers and networking. A ransomware attack on one of our clients sparked my curiosity about cyber security, leading me to self-study and later attend the CyberSec Bootcamp by ThriveDX at UCF. From there, I took on projects and proposals - implementing security controls for clients and identifying improvements to our services and later finding my passion in Cyber Security.


When not geeking out over tech, you can find me trekking or strumming my guitar in the wilderness.

  • Familiar Security Frameworks

    - NIST Cybersecurity Framework
    - NIST Risk Management - 800-37
    - NIST Security and Privacy Controls - 800-53
    - ISECOM's Open Source Security Testing Methodology Manual
    - OWASP Foundation's Web Security Testing Guide
    I have an entire bookmark collection for these :)

  • Human Things

    - Happy dad of two cats.
    - Learned basic web dev to make this portfolio.
    - Can exit VIM in 5 different ways ;)

September 2018 - October 2021
